values: To think is to have an opinion or thought about something.
I think summer is the best season.
vt. 想；认为；想像；想起；打算
vt. 想；认为；想像；想起；打算

- vi. 想；认为
- n. [口]想；想法
- adj. [俚]思想的

To think is to use your mind to consider and form ideas or opinions about something.
Having the power of thought or rational judgment.
n. 想；想法,adj. 思想的,vi. 想；认为,vt. 想；认为；想起；想像；打算
